  <rightsNotes>Due to the breadth of time this collection covers, different rules apply to different photos. Photos published before 1923 are public domain and have no known rights restrictions. Photos created or published after 1/1/1923 (but before 1/1/1964) that lack a copyright notice are in the public domain and have no known rights restrictions. Photos created or published after 1/1/1923 (but before 1/1/1964) that have a copyright notice can only be used on NYPL's websites or inside exhibition catalogs and NYPL brochures, unless specific clearance has been granted by the Rights Clearance Analyst. Restrictions for post-1923 photos will be set at the item level. </rightsNotes>
  <useStatement>
    <use type="copyright_status">PDCDPP</use>
    <useStatementText>The New York Public Library believes that this item is in the public domain under the laws of the United States, but did not make a determination as to its copyright status under the copyright laws of other countries. This item may not be in the public domain under the laws of other countries. Though not required, if you want to credit us as the source, please use the following statement, "From The New York Public Library," and provide a link back to the item on our Digital Collections site. Doing so helps us track how our collection is used and helps justify freely releasing even more content in the future.</useStatementText>
    <useStatementURI>http://rightsstatements.org/vocab/NoC-US/1.0/</useStatementURI>
  </useStatement>
</nyplRights>

note_mtxt: Catskill Mountain scenery, including mountains, glen and waterfall views, views of hotels, bridges, tourists, the "Rip Van Winkle House" and Sleepy Hollow.  Some views duplicated.
Robert Dennis Collection of Stereoscopic Views.
Title from label.  Includes several series with same title.
